description:
This is the related-multi table for the 'Kind of Visit' item in the treatment plan scheduling group of tables.





To be used with tables:


TPL_SCHED_SELECTED


TPL_SCHED_VST_DEP


TPL_SCHED_VST_LEN


TPL_SCHED_VST_PROV


TPL_SCHED_VST_TYP

columns.name: TREATMENT_PLAN_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the treatment plan.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: KIND_OF_VISIT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number for the oncology kind of visit to be scheduled for the visit on this value line.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes
